title: Summa Elvetica: preorders
author: VD
content_html: Marcher Lord’s preorder page for the forthcoming hardcover edition of Summa Elvetica: A Casuistry of the Elvish Controversy is now live.  You can preorder the ~450-page book for $17.99, which is a discount from the retail price of $24.99.  As I mentioned before, those preordering will also receive a free ebook copy of The Last Witchking.  The preorder offer will be available until April 30th.
content_text:
Marcher Lord’s preorder page for the forthcoming hardcover edition of
Summa Elvetica: A Casuistry of the Elvish Controversy
is now live.  You can
preorder the ~450-page book for $17.99
, which is a discount from the retail price of $24.99.  As I mentioned before, those preordering will also receive a free ebook copy of
The Last Witchking
.  The preorder offer will be available until April 30th.
